person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A police spokesman said two youths believed to be supporters of President Nelson Mandela 's African National Congress ( ANC ) had been killed when unknown gunmen opened fire at the rural settlement of Izingolweni on KwaZulu-Natal province 's south coast on Thursday night .

Let's think step by step.

1. A police spokesman
2. Two youths
3. President Nelson Mandela
4. African National Congress (ANC)
5. Unknown gunmen
6. Izingolweni
7. KwaZulu- Natal province
8. South coast.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. A police spokesman
2. Two youths
3. President Nelson Mandela
4. Unknown gunmen.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| A police spokesman |
| Two youths |
| President Nelson Mandela |
| Unknown gunmen |
